noteList:
Human Features:
• One extra skill proficiency of your choosing
• One bonus feat of your choosing
Haunted One Feature:
• Commoners will do what they can to help you
Wizard Features:
• Regain half your level (min 1) worth of spell slots during a short rest (once per day)
• Prodigy: You gain one language, one skill proficiency, one skill double proficiency, and one tool proficiency
• Double proficiency with chosen skills (Arcana)
Warlock Features:
• Warlock Archetype: Old One
• The spells dissonant whispers and hideous laughter are added to the warlock spell list for you
• You can telepathically communicate with any creature that knows any language within 30 feet
• Wizard Archetype: Transmutation
• Half gold/time cost to copy school spells
• You can alter the composition of objects (see rules)
• War Caster: You gain advantage on concentration vs damage, can still cast while holding weapons, and can cast a single target 1 action spell as an opportunity attack
• Forceful Cantrip: You can push creatures you hit with eldritch blast ten feet
• Mage Armor Expert: You don't use a spell slot when casting mage armor on yourself
• Tome: You can cast three cantrips from any class (see rules)
• The spells detect thoughts and phantasmal force are added to the warlock spell list for you
• Resilient: You gain proficiency with one save and +1 to that ability
Light Armor
Daggers, Darts, Slings, Quarterstaffs, Light Crossbows
